title: Razor Archives 002 (London Night - 1997) (Talon-Novus) [NVS-D]
description:
English | CBR | 69 Pages

Razor Archives #2
Publisher:  London Night Studios
Publication Date:  1997

Writer:  Everette Hartsoe
Pencillers:  Richard Pollard
Inker:  Everette Hartsoe
Letterer:  T.W. Montgomery
Cover Artist:  Javier Saltares

Despite barely surviving her last encounter with Roman Von Drake and his assassin femme fatale Stryke, Razor visits Kat and gears up for a rematch. Von Drake isn't content to live and let live, and has his men track Detective Alex London to his house and shoot him.

Stryke's dreams are getting more and more disturbing as she senses Von Drake is keeping secrets from her, and in a fit of rage she attacks him, demanding to know the truth. Razor, meanwhile, infiltrates Von Drake's tower and begins slaughtering her way towards the man who killed her father so many years ago. She reaches Von Drake's room in time to see him impale Stryke, whom she has deduced to be her sister, through the stomach.

Razor promised Det. London a body bag with Von Drake's remains, but is even her righteous fury able to overcome her opponent's seemingly-endless stamina and physical prowess?

Thanks goes to Talon for this release.
